chatLinkGuide.title: How to create KakaoTalk open chat link
chatLinkGuide.step1: Open KakaoTalk app and go to Chat tab > Open Chat
chatLinkGuide.step3: Set chat room name (e.g. CarryOn Delivery Inquiry)
chatLinkGuide.step5: Copy Chat Room > Chat Room Info > Chat Room Link
chatLinkGuide.note: * The link will be used for 1:1 contact with the carrier

buyer.noRequestsDesc: Want to buy something from abroad? Register a new request and find a carrier.

carrier.noTripsDesc: Planning to travel abroad? Register your trip and earn rewards.

hero.slogan: Connecting people through extra luggage space
hero.registerTrip: Register your trip and become a carrier with CarryOn.

howItWorks.title: How CarryOn Works
howItWorks.step1Desc: Enter your travel schedule and prepare to share your extra luggage space.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Check delivery requests that match your trip and select the ones you want to fulfill.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Discuss item details and delivery methods with buyers through open chat.
howItWorks.step4Desc: Purchase items yourself or receive them from buyers to prepare for delivery.
howItWorks.step5Desc: Hand over the items to buyers at the airport or locally and receive your fee.
howItWorks.rolesDesc: In CarryOn, Buyers and Carriers collaborate in their own ways.
howItWorks.buyerRole1: Request items and offer a fee
howItWorks.buyerRole2: Communicate with carriers via open chat and confirm matching
howItWorks.buyerRole3: Receive items at the airport or locally
howItWorks.carrierRole2: Choose requests from the list and match with buyers
howItWorks.carrierRole3: Communicate with buyers and receive payment after delivery

forBuyers.title: Korean Products, Cheaper and More Freely
forBuyers.subtitle:
Cheaper than direct purchases. Get what you want, the way you want it.
Through the carrier's extra space, receive items flexibly without limitations.
forBuyers.benefitsTitle: In These Cases, CarryOn is Much More Beneficial
forBuyers.customsDesc:
CarryOn operates as a one-time consignment shipping between individuals, usually passing through customs without duties.
Carriers personally carry and deliver items, and due to the small quantity and non-commercial nature, they are often processed simply at customs.

products.diorSet: Duty-Free Dior Cosmetics Set (Lip Balm, Eye Cream, Hand Cream)
products.diorComment: £178,000 in London, can be purchased for ₩112,000 at duty-free shops
products.johnnieComment: Available at duty-free shops. Much cheaper than London supermarkets and popular as gifts
products.musinsaComment: Cannot be purchased in the UK. Only available in Korea → Brand that cannot be shipped internationally
products.onCloudComment: Korean official price ₩219,000. More expensive in the UK at around ₩316,000, and customs duties apply when ordering from Korea. Can be received without customs duties through CarryOn
products.marlboroComment: Airport duty-free ₩32,000 vs London ₩302,000. (Only allowed quantities within customs regulations)
